snippet: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said Wednesday that he would comply with an international court order to halt Japanese whale hunts off Antarctica.
abstract: Japanese Prime Min Shinzo Abe says that he will comply with international court order to halt Japanese whale hunts off Antarctica.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said Wednesday that he would comply with an international court order to halt Japanese whale hunts off Antarctica.

headline.main: Japan Says It Will Abide by Whaling Ruling
headline.print_headline: Japan Will Abide by Whaling Ruling
